20110111150511.000|20110111150516.000|CC1|I'M -- I'M OUTRAGED THAT SOMEONE
20110111150516.000|20110111150519.000|CC1|LIKE GABRIELLE GIFFORDS WAS     
20110111150519.000|20110111150519.000|CC1|ATTACKED.

20110111150522.000|20110111150524.000|CC1|DESCRIBE THE SITUATION FOR US?  
20110111150524.000|20110111150528.000|CC1|>> I WAS LOOKING AT MY OWN NOTES
20110111150528.000|20110111150530.000|CC1|WHICH CONSISTED OF A COUPLE OF  
20110111150530.000|20110111150531.000|CC1|QUESTIONS, THINGS THAT I WANTED 
20110111150531.000|20110111150533.000|CC1|TO TALK TO HER ABOUT AND FORMED 
20110111150533.000|20110111150535.000|CC1|UP IN A LINE.                   
20110111150535.000|20110111150537.000|CC1|I WAS ABOUT TEN FEET AWAY FROM  
20110111150537.000|20110111150538.000|CC1|HER.                            
20110111150538.000|20110111150539.000|CC1|>> IT'S MASS CHAOS.

20110111150540.000|20110111150542.000|CC1|WHAT DID YOU SEE UNFOLD IN FRONT
20110111150542.000|20110111150544.000|CC1|OF YOU?                         
20110111150544.000|20110111150549.000|CC1|>> WELL, IT WAS -- IT WAS LIKE A
20110111150549.000|20110111150553.000|CC1|BAD CRIME DRAMA WITH A GUN BEING
20110111150553.000|20110111150556.000|CC1|POINTED TOWARDS ME AND VERY     
20110111150556.000|20110111150600.000|CC1|SEEMED LIKE ATHLETIC, YOUNG MAN 
20110111150600.000|20110111150601.000|CC1|PUMPING ROUNDS OFF AT EVERYBODY 
20110111150601.000|20110111150607.000|CC1|AND TAKING AIM AT US.           
20110111150607.000|20110111150612.000|CC1|SO, NOT WANTING TO LEAVE THE    
20110111150612.000|20110111150614.000|CC1|WORLD VERY SOON AND NOT THINKING

20110111150617.000|20110111150620.000|CC1|MAYBE GET KILLED TRYING TO STOP

20110111150622.000|20110111150625.000|CC1|I WAS AT, I FELL TO THE GROUND. 
20110111150625.000|20110111150628.000|CC1|AS OTHER PEOPLE WERE DOING.     
20110111150628.000|20110111150630.000|CC1|AND I EXPECTED THE WORST TO     
20110111150630.000|20110111150632.000|CC1|OCCUR AFTER THAT.               
20110111150632.000|20110111150634.000|CC1|>> YOU SAID YOU PLAYED DEAD,    
20110111150634.000|20110111150635.000|CC1|FELL TO THE GROUND.             
20110111150635.000|20110111150637.000|CC1|YOU WERE THEN HIT IN THE KNEE   
20110111150637.000|20110111150639.000|CC1|AND THEN IN THE BACK, AS WELL.  
20110111150639.000|20110111150640.000|CC1|WHEN'S GOING THROUGH YOUR MIND? 
20110111150640.000|20110111150641.000|CC1|DID YOU KNOW AT THAT POINT THAT 
20110111150641.000|20110111150644.000|CC1|YOU HAD BEEN SHOT?              
20110111150644.000|20110111150647.000|CC1|>> I -- I FELT THE ROUND ENTER  
20110111150647.000|20110111150648.000|CC1|MY KNEE.                        
20110111150648.000|20110111150649.000|CC1|I DIDN'T KNOW ABOUT THE FRAGMENT
20110111150649.000|20110111150653.000|CC1|IN MY BACK.                     
20110111150653.000|20110111150655.000|CC1|I WAS INCREDULOUS.              
20110111150655.000|20110111150701.000|CC1|I HADN'T EVER HAD ANY KIND OF   
20110111150701.000|20110111150704.000|CC1|TRAUMA EXPERIENCE AT THAT LEVEL 
20110111150704.000|20110111150705.000|CC1|BEFORE.                         
20110111150705.000|20110111150708.000|CC1|AND I DIDN'T KNOW QUITE HOW TO  
20110111150708.000|20110111150709.000|CC1|REACT.                          
20110111150709.000|20110111150714.000|CC1|I FELT LIKE WE WERE IN FOR MORE 
20110111150714.000|20110111150717.000|CC1|AND POSSIBLY TO BE GIVEN A CUE  
20110111150717.000|20110111150723.000|CC1|DA GRA BY THIS MADMAN THAT WAS  
20110111150723.000|20110111150725.000|CC1|SO VIGOROUSLY EXERCISING HIS

20110111150727.000|20110111150728.000|CC1|A WOMAN KNOCKED THE CLIP OUT OF 
20110111150728.000|20110111150730.000|CC1|HIS HAND AND I THINK THAT WAS   
20110111150730.000|20110111150731.000|CC1|PROBABLY INTENDED AS -- I FELT  
20110111150731.000|20110111150733.000|CC1|THAT -- I SENSED THAT THAT WAS  
20110111150733.000|20110111150734.000|CC1|GOING TO BE THE END OF ME.      
20110111150734.000|20110111150736.000|CC1|>> IF YOU HAD AN OPPORTUNITY TO 
20110111150736.000|20110111150738.000|CC1|SPEAK WITH THE CONGRESSWOMAN,   
20110111150738.000|20110111150741.000|CC1|WHAT WOULD YOU SAY TO HER AS SHE
20110111150741.000|20110111150742.000|CC1|CONTINUES TO RECOVER NOW?       
20110111150742.000|20110111150744.000|CC1|>> WELL, I WOULD GIVE HER EVERY 
20110111150744.000|20110111150746.000|CC1|KIND OF ENCOURAGEMENT THAT I    
20110111150746.000|20110111150748.000|CC1|COULD POSSIBLY THINK UP.

20110111150752.000|20110111150756.000|CC1|BEHALF OF VETERANS SUCH AS      
20110111150756.000|20110111150758.000|CC1|MYSELF FOR STANDING UP FOR

20110111151934.000|20110111151934.000|CC1|   OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES

20110111151936.000|20110111151938.000|CC1|     OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.

20110111151938.000|20110111151940.000|CC1|        SUICIDAL THOUGHTS

20110111151942.000|20110111151942.000|CC1|     PRISTIQ IS NOT APPROVED    
20110111151942.000|20110111151945.000|CC1|     FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.     
20110111151945.000|20110111151947.000|CC1| DO NOT TAKE PRISTIQ WITH MAOIS.

20110111151952.000|20110111151952.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20110111151952.000|20110111151954.000|CC1|   ABOUT ALL YOUR MEDICATIONS,
